blocks.content:
## About Me

I'm Ben Hurley. Florida State grad. Golfer. Guitarist. Fascinated in everything tech and finance. Originally from Tampa, Florida. Moved to New York City in 2018. Currently working as a software engineer for [Pariveda Solutions](https://www.parivedasolutions.com "Pariveda Solutions"). 

## Side Gigs / Hobbies

Since I have to be doing something at all times, I'm also...

* A Forum Moderator for [Whizlabs ](https://www.whizlabs.com "Whizlabs Inc.")
* Co-Founder of [Big Cigar Guy™](https://www.bigcigarguy.com "Big Cigar Guy™")
* Founder of [NYC Restrooms](https://www.instagram.com/nyc_restrooms "NYC Restrooms - Instagram")
* Freelancer for [Professional Resume & Linkedin Reviews](https://www.fiverr.com/s2/531f0ab3b9 "Fiver - Ben's Professional Résumé Reviews")

hero.headline: Ben Hurley
hero.textline: If you're here, you're interested in something...
